projectGridLines.title: CUJ trace Analysis and identification of problem
projectGridLines.description:
The qualifications for a 'Android System Performance Engineer' typically include the following:

1. A bachelor's or masters degree in Computer Science Engineering

2. Strong proficiency in Java, C, C++ & Python

3. Good understanding of 'Operating Systems' concepts

4. Familiar with the Android ecosystem and available libraries

5. Exceptional verbal and written communication skills

6. Aptitude for giving and receiving constructive feedback

7. Strong problem-solving abilities and critical thinking

8. Collaborative teamwork capabilities Objective:

A user's experience with Samsung Galaxy phones, either positive or negative, is largely defined by Critical User Journey. These are series of interactions (~70) that users have with Samsung Galaxy Phones and are most common journeys to c. If these interactions have janks with several preconditions, user experience if not good with a given mobile phone.

This project goal is to develop an offline tools to learn, analyze and understand CUJ traces automatically.

The tool is also expected to identify the reason for janks from large number of trace files.

Success Criteria: Output of the tool clearly showing the problematic sections in a trace file.

projectGridLines.title: DAMON monitoring with record option
projectGridLines.description:
The qualifications for a 'Android System Memory Engineer' typically include the following:

1. A bachelor's or masters degree in Computer Science Engineering

2. Strong proficiency in Java, C, C++ & Python

3. Good understanding of 'Operating Systems' concepts

4. Familiar with the Android ecosystem and available libraries

5. Exceptional verbal and written communication skills

6. Aptitude for giving and receiving constructive feedback

7. Strong problem-solving abilities and critical thinking

8. Collaborative teamwork capabilities Objective:

DAMON (Data Access MONitor) is a data access monitoring framework subsystem for Linuk kernel while making accuracy and overhead controllable. The fundamental access monitorings require primitives that dependent on and optimized for the target address space. On the other hand, the accuracy and overhead tradeoff mechanism, which is the core of DAMON, is in the pure logic space. DAMON separates the two parts in different layers and defines its interface to allow various low level primitives implementations configurable with the core logic.Due to this separated design and the configurable interface, users can extend DAMON for any address space by configuring the core logics with appropriate low level primitive implementations.

Goal of this project is to monitor the virtual address space of every process to identify idle pages, critial pages using record option in DAMON. This data can be used to prefetch the reclaimed pages of a particular process in advance to improve warm launch time of a given application

Success Criteria: Output the offset of the VMA from base address as idle pages, critical pages etc

projectGridLines.title: Wrapper for file operations using mmap
projectGridLines.description:
The qualifications for an 'Android System Memory Engineer' typically include the following:

1. A bachelor's or masters degree in Computer Science Engineering

2. Strong proficiency in Java, C, C++ & Python

3. Good understanding of 'Operating Systems' concepts

4. Familiar with the Android ecosystem and available libraries

5. Exceptional verbal and written communication skills

6. Aptitude for giving and receiving constructive feedback

7. Strong problem-solving abilities and critical thinking

8. Collaborative teamwork capabilities Objective:

Memory mangement in Android is one of the fundamental areas that can help define the user experience. Lesser the memory requirement in Android at any given time faster the experience. Efficient management of memory proactively helps ensure lesser number of LMKs, reclaimations etc.

This project focuses on understaning file page handling with system calls related to fopen, fread, fwrite etc and implmenting an efficient reclaim algorithm to evict the file pages.

At present only mapped file pages are recovered through madvise(), there is no way to reclaim unmapped file pages. Objective is to overwrite file operations , fopen, fread, fwrite etc and internally implement using mmap api

Success Criteria: With POCs able to see the file pages in mmaps table when file operations are performed.

projectGridLines.title: Battery Data acquisition and Analysis
projectGridLines.description:
The qualifications for an 'Android Battery Charging Engineer' typically include the following:

1. A bachelor's or masters degree in Computer Science Engineering

2. Strong proficiency in Python & C

3. Good understanding of Scripting, data analysis and basic statistics

4. Familiar with the Android ecosystem and available libraries

5. Exceptional verbal and written communication skills

6. Aptitude for giving and receiving constructive feedback

7. Strong problem-solving abilities and critical thinking

8. Collaborative teamwork capabilities Objective:

Concerns for sustainability and environmental friendliness will push charging technology toward greater efficiency and eco-friendliness. This includes charging efficiency, reduced energy wastage & renewable energy sources. One of the areas which we are working on today is consequences of thermal conditions on battery charging.

Goal of this project is to understand the thermal conditions in and around the battery to be able to accurately predict the impact of charging and to take necessary actions to address the same.

Success Criteria:

Thermal behaviour: Demonstrate 10% benefit in charge time

Charging behaviour : Categorise the user data into distinct patterns.

projectGridLines.title: Game Chat bot Dev
projectGridLines.description:
The qualifications for an 'Graphics & Game Engineer' typically include the following:

1. A bachelor's or masters degree in Computer Science Engineering

2. Strong proficiency in Java, Kotlin & Python

3. Good understanding of working knowledge of AI models for text and NLP will be helpful

4. Familiar with the Android ecosystem and available libraries

5. Exceptional verbal and written communication skills

6. Aptitude for giving and receiving constructive feedback

7. Strong problem-solving abilities and critical thinking

8. Collaborative teamwork capabilities Objective:

Game Plugins offers various performance improvement and enrichment solutions for perfecting your game play. Gamers have fun with our plugins for the best game play experience ever! Game Plugins will run the plugins that you've turned on every time you start gaming, and stop them when the game is in the back-ground.

Goal of this project is to build a Gaming chat bot for Samsung Game Service front end

Success Criteria: Demonstrate 2-3 text based scenarios with Chat bot using conversational AI

projectGridLines.title: Vulkan renderer for AURA
projectGridLines.description:
The qualifications for a 'Graphics & Game Engineer' typically include the following:

1. A bachelor's or masters degree in Computer Science Engineering

2. Strong proficiency in Java, C, C++

3. Good understanding of Pytorch,Tensorflow, Tflite, openGL

4. Familiar with the Android ecosystem and available libraries

5. Exceptional verbal and written communication skills

6. Aptitude for giving and receiving constructive feedback

7. Strong problem-solving abilities and critical thinking

8. Collaborative teamwork capabilities Objective:

Vulkan is a new-generation graphics and compute API for high-efficiency, cross-platform access to GPUs. As the industry’s only open standard modern GPU API, Vulkan is unique in enabling developers to write applications that are portable to multiple diverse platforms.

Goal of this project is to build a vulkan based render backend which can be used for Animations, 3D etc

Success Criteria: Demonstrate 3D Model loading and texture based mesh rendering using PBR with Vulkan 3D renderer

projectGridLines.title: Text readability problem
projectGridLines.description:
The qualifications for a 'Graphics & Game Engineer' typically include the following:

1. A bachelor's or masters degree in Computer Science Engineering

2. Strong proficiency in C/C++, opengl, vulkan

3. Familiar with the Android ecosystem and available libraries

4. Exceptional verbal and written communication skills

5. Aptitude for giving and receiving constructive feedback

6. Strong problem-solving abilities and critical thinking

7. Collaborative teamwork capabilities Objective:

Rendering of text in AR/VR applications still follows models from the ’90s.

Some of the technical considerations for a good typography include- Field of view (FoV), Brightness and contrast, Resolution, Refresh rate, Halation, Chromatic aberration & Screen door effect.

Goal of this project is to analyse text rendering in current VR/AR/MR devices and propose methods to improve Text rendering quality in VR

Success Criteria: Demonstrate improved Text rendering using new algorithm or proposed enhancement as part of this project

projectGridLines.title: Memory Usage Investigation on Android
projectGridLines.description:
The qualifications for an Android System Performance engineer typically include the following:

1. A bachelor's or masters degree in Computer Science Engineering

2. Strong proficiency in Java, C, C++ & Python

3. Good understanding of Android framework, ADB, Android studio, Operating Systems ,Graphics pipeline knowledge will be helpful.

4. Familiar with the Android ecosystem and available libraries

5. Exceptional verbal and written communication skills

6. Aptitude for giving and receiving constructive feedback

7. Strong problem-solving abilities and critical thinking

8. Collaborative teamwork capabilities Objective:

Vulkan is a new-generation graphics and compute API for high-efficiency, cross-platform access to GPUs. As the industry’s only open standard modern GPU API, Vulkan is unique in enabling developers to write applications that are portable to multiple diverse platforms.

Goal of this project is to build a detailed memory investigation analysis for any Skia VK(vulkan) apps or in Android Framework and propose & implement optimisations

Success Criteria: Show Improvement by 10% memory reduction

projectGridLines.title: Graphite backend study and improvement plan
projectGridLines.description:
The qualifications for an Android System Performance engineer typically include the following:

1. A bachelor's or masters degree in Computer Science Engineering

2. Strong proficiency in Java, C, C++ & Python

3. Good understanding of Android framework, ADB, Android studio, Operating Systems ,Graphics pipeline knowledge will be helpful.

4. Familiar with the Android ecosystem and available libraries

5. Exceptional verbal and written communication skills

6. Aptitude for giving and receiving constructive feedback

7. Strong problem-solving abilities and critical thinking

8. Collaborative teamwork capabilities

Objective:

Skia is an open source 2D graphics library which provides common APIs that work across a variety of hardware and software platforms. It serves as the graphics engine for Google Chrome and ChromeOS, Android, Flutter, and many other products. Skia is a complete 2D graphic library for drawing Text, Geometries, and Images. Most of the 2D rendering on Android happens with Skia.

There are multiple backend renderers that support vulkan in skia (Ganesh, Graphite)

This project is to build a detailed flow of Graphite calls from Skia backend and prepare detailed report on the Graphite architecture and call flow using Vulkan

Success Criteria: Instrumentation logs for Graphite and detail report for profiling in terms of memory, rendering performance using Graphite renderer
